name: AllowInteriorWeapons
warnings: This function does not work in the current SA:MP version!
description: Toggle whether the usage of weapons in interiors is allowed or not.

params_body.name: allow
params_body.description: 1 to enable weapons in interiors (enabled by default), 0 to disable weapons in interiors.
